con:request.name: AddAchToken (Corporate)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AddAchToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Token> <acr2:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr2:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr2:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr2:CustomerCode> <acr2:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr2:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr2:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr2:CustomerZipCode> <acr2:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr2:MerchantId> <acr2:Signature>${CustomerSignature}</acr2:Signature> <acr2:TokenId xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:ABANumber>${CorpCheckABA}</acr2:ABANumber> <acr2:AccountNumber>${CorpCheckAccount}</acr2:AccountNumber> <acr2:AccountType>Checking</acr2:AccountType> <acr2:BirthDay xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:CheckType>Corporate</acr2:CheckType> <acr2:City xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:DriversNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:FirstName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:InsuranceInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:LastName xsi:nil="true" /> <acr2:Phone>${CustomerPhone}</acr2:Phone> <acr2:State xsi:nil="true" /> </acr1:Token> </tem:request> </tem:AddAchToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:UseToken>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TokenId>${AddAchToken (Personal)#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddAchTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddAchTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Credit</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:UseToken>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteAchToken (Corporate)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:DeleteAchToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TokenId>${AddAchToken (Corporate)#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddAchTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddAchTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId> </tem:request> </tem:DeleteAchToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: DeleteAchToken (Personal)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:DeleteAchToken> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TokenId>${AddAchToken (Personal)#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.Tokens.v2.Common.Responses'; //ns1:AddAchTokenResponse[1]/ns1:AddAchTokenResult[1]/a:TokenId[1]}</acr1:TokenId> </tem:request> </tem:DeleteAchToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
